REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0788 reute b f BC-ECSC-ISSUES-100-MLN-S 03-13 0072

TEXT.TITLE: ECSC ISSUES 100 MLN STG EUROBOND DUE 1992
TEXT.BODY: The European Coal and Steel Community is issuing a 100 mln stg eurobond due April 6, 1992 paying 9-3/8 pct and priced at 101-5/8 pct, lead manager Warburg Securities said. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 stg and will be listed in Luxembourg. Fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession and 5/8 pct for management and underwriting. REUTER
